name: go
documentation: Outputs a value directly into http response content.

name: safe
documentation: Encodes a value to make it safe for HTML output.

name: setItem
documentation: Stores a value in the current context.

name: getItem
documentation: Retrieves a value stored in the current context using a specified key.

name: setTemp
documentation: Stores a temporary value for the session.

name: getTemp
documentation: Retrieves a temporary value stored in the session using a specified key.

name: setStatus
documentation: Sets the HTTP status code and optional message for the response.

name: getError
documentation: Retrieves the last error that occurred on the server.

name: clearError
documentation: Clears the last error that occurred on the server.

name: redirect
documentation: Redirects the user to a different URL.

name: addHeader
documentation: Adds a custom header to the HTTP response.

name: setCookie
documentation: Sets a cookie in the HTTP response.

name: deleteCookie
documentation: Deletes a cookie by setting its expiration date to the past.
